CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( RFI_Generated_for_CA_Report__c , 'Completed - Error'), ISPICKVAL( RFI_Generated_for_CO_Report__c , 'Completed - Error')), 'not generated, please contact your administrator', IF( AND(ISPICKVAL( RFI_Generated_for_CA_Report__c , 'Completed'), ISPICKVAL( RFI_Generated_for_CO_Report__c , 'Completed')), 'generated successfully, kindly review RFI against Plant Asset', ''))
CustomField.label: RFI Generation Status For Email Template
